search_results.title: Demi (author)
search_results.snippet: Demi (born Charlotte Dumaresq Hunt; September 2, 1942) is a children's book author and illustrator. During her career she has published over 300 titles.

search_results.title: Demi: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Demi was born in Cambridge, Mass. She studied at the Instituto Allende in Guanajuato, Mexico, at Immaculate Heart College with Sisters Magdalen Mary and Sister ...

search_results.title: Demi | Official Publisher Page
search_results.snippet: Demi is the award-winning creator of numerous books for children, including The Empty Pot; Buddha; The Dalai Lama; The Legend of Saint Nicholas; Gandhi.
